prod_short_desc: Help Kai protect the golden snake staff and stop Lasha!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action in LEGO® Juniors NINJAGO™, and help Kai battle Lasha the snake villain for the golden snake staff, featuring a super Ninja car, motorbike and other accessories. This LEGO® Juniors set offers an easy start to building with the LEGO brick for ages 4-7, with easy-to assemble models featuring iconic Ninja adventures. Includes 2 minifigures: Kai and Lasha the snake villain.
Includes 2 minifigures: Kai and Lasha.
Features Kai's super Ninja car with rolling wheels and seat, Lasha's motorbike and a golden snake staff shrine with ramp.
Shrine features flames that can be knocked down.
Jump over the lava with Lasha's motorbike and battle Kai.
Quick-start car base helps ease of building.
Easy-to-follow building instructions included.
Includes Kai's Ninja sword.
Car measures over 1” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
Motorbike measures over 1” high, 3” long and under 1” wide.
Golden snake staff shrine with ramp measures over 4” high, 2” wide and 3” long.
